Computer.name: JIM'S FINE MEATS
Computer.file:
HEY YOU! YEAH YOU!
LOOKS LIKE YOU KNOW YOUR WAY AROUND A COMPUTER. WE LIKE YOUR ATTITUDE. IT'S THE SAME KIND OF POSITIVE GO-GETTER ATTITUDE THAT GOES INTO EVERY SAUSAGE AT JIM'S FINE MEATS!
WE WANNA REWARD YOU. ENJOY THIS POSITIVELY SCRUMPTIOUS AND EYE-CATCHING X-SERVER THEME, JUST FOR YOU.
~ JIM OF JIM'S FINE MEATS
